name: Spaceman Scramble
description:
Party platformer game for up to 4 players.

Created as a final year project, features online and local multiplayer.

Hosting an online game requires you to forward ports 7777 and 8081.

Credits: Programmers:

Will Noble

Shay Pearson

Simon Brown

Alistair Keeling-Tucker

Artists:

Jess Bonser
